get.description: The API returns the latest document/filings feed for a given document type.

parameters.name: document_type
parameters.description: Type of document (e.g., earnings-transcript)

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Comma-separated exchange:ticker values. Example - NSE:ZOMATO, BSE:TCS

parameters.name: quarter
parameters.description: Comma-separated Quarter values - (e.g., Q1,Q2)

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Comma-separated Year values - (e.g., 2024,2023)

parameters.name: sector
parameters.description: Comma-separated sector values based on Industry Classification. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=0#gid=0

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Comma-separated industry values based on Industry Classification. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=582731802#gid=582731802

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page

get.description: The API returns the latest announcement feed from Indian stock exchanges, BSE and NSE. Each announcement is enriched with AI-generated insights, such as summary, category tags from a predefined set of categories and sentiment of the announcement content. Returns paginated announcement feed based on provided filters sorted by date descending. If no parameters are sent, the API returns the latest paginated feed.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Comma-separated exchange:ticker values. Example - NSE:ZOMATO, BSE:TCS

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: announcement_type_id
parameters.description: Comma-separated Announcement Category IDs (Allowed Values - 1 to 26). Check the Category-ID Map - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit#gid=853687104

parameters.name: sentiment
parameters.description: Comma-separated sentiment values (Allowed values - positive, negative, neutral).

parameters.name: sector
parameters.description: Comma-separated sector values based on Industry Classification. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=0#gid=0

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Comma-separated industry values based on Industry Classification. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=582731802#gid=582731802

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per query (max value = 50, default = 20).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Required for pagination. Default=1

get.description: The API takes a search query and returns the matching announcements based on provided filters sorted by date descending.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Seach term

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Comma-separated exchange:ticker values. Example - NSE:ZOMATO, BSE:TCS

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: announcement_type_id
parameters.description: Comma-separated Announcement Category IDs (Allowed Values - 1 to 26). Check the Category-ID Map - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit#gid=853687104

parameters.name: sentiment
parameters.description: Comma-separated sentiment values (Allowed values - positive, negative, neutral).

parameters.name: sector
parameters.description: Comma-separated sector values based on Industry Classification. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=0#gid=0

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Comma-separated industry values based on Industry Classification. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=582731802#gid=582731802

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per query (max value = 50, default = 20).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Required for pagination. Default=1

200.description: Success response. Contains Paginated Announcement Search results.

post.description: Search keywords across all the documents or a subset of documents using filters. Returns upto 100 search results sorted by latest date

get.description: Fetch all the document embeddings of a filing/document based on the query parameters

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the document/filing

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Exchange ticker of the company. Format - exchange:exchange_ticker/code. Eg: BSE:TCS, BSE:532540, NSE:OLECTRA

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year of the document/filing. Format - YYYY

parameters.name: quarter
parameters.description: Fiscal quarter of the document. Applicable for earnings-transcript document type

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. Optional, default=1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results per page. Optional, default=100

200.description: Successful response. Contains the list of chunks for given query vector

post.summary: Get filing chunks for the given query
post.description: For a given query, returns the similar semantic chunks of filings from earnings transcripts and 10-Ks matching the query

query.description: The query for which similar chunks has to be returned

top_k.description: Number of top matching docs in the response. Optional. Default=10, Max=100

filters.description: Filters can be used to narrow the search scope. For example, the search can be limited to few tickers only. Without filters, search will be performed across all the filings

tickers.description: Exchange tickers of the companies. Max 100 companies. Format - exchange:exchange_ticker/code. Eg: BSE:TCS, BSE:532540, NSE:OLECTRA

sectors.description: Sector values based on Industry Classification. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17Gwb93kbebsW6880Nln8eHosc9G0Dnux3uGtOzcSZvE/edit?gid=0#gid=0

industries.description: Industries (based on Industry Classification) to filter by. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17Gwb93kbebsW6880Nln8eHosc9G0Dnux3uGtOzcSZvE/edit?gid=998183131#gid=998183131

years.description: Year of the filing. Format - YYYY

quarters.description: Quarter of the filing. Only for earnings-transcript

200.description: Successful response. Contains the list of chunks for given query vector

tickers.description: Company Tickers. Format: exchange:ticker values. Example - [NSE:ZOMATO, BSE:TCS]

sectors.description: Sectors (based on Industry Classification) to filter by. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=0#gid=0

industries.description: Industries (based on Industry Classification) to filter by. Check the valid values - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17-Zq8E6G7hAq4-3QdjLj_b1EGghFcM9OB7Om5AXSLRI/edit?gid=582731802#gid=582731802

id.description: Company ID/Code in the exchange. Not present for NSE

Document.description: Represents details of a company document. A document could be either earnings transcript, Annual Report or Announcement. Contains the link to the raw document and the AI insights of the document

pdf_link.description: PDF Link of the document. A document can have either a pdf_link or html_link

html_link.description: HTML Link of the document. A document can have either a pdf_link or html_link

ai_insights.description: Contains either the url or the data of AI Insights based on API invoked

url.description: If insights are present for the document, the url provides the API Path to the AI insights. Else the object is empty or null. Note: The url attribute is not present in AI Insights API response. Its present only in the Document Feed API Response

published_date.description: UTC Timestamp of the document published date-time

DocumentWithSearchResults.description: Represents details of a matching company document.

pdf_link.description: PDF Link of the document. A document can have either a pdf_link or html_link

html_link.description: HTML Link of the document. A document can have either a pdf_link or html_link

ai_insights.description: Contains either the url or the data of AI Insights based on API invoked

url.description: If insights are present for the document, the url provides the API Path to the AI insights. Else the object is empty or null. Note: The url attribute is not present in AI Insights API response. Its present only in the Document Feed API Response

published_date.description: UTC Timestamp of the document published date-time

highlights.description: Text in the document matching with the query

highlight_term.description: query term and other similar terms

EarningsTranscriptWithAIInsights.description: Represents details of a company document. A document could be either earnings transcript, Annual Report or Announcement. Contains the link to the raw document and the AI insights of the document

pdf_link.description: PDF Link of the document. A document can have either a pdf_link or html_link

html_link.description: HTML Link of the document. A document can have either a pdf_link or html_link

ai_insights.description: Contains either the url or the data of AI Insights based on API invoked

url.description: If insights are present for the document, the url provides the API Path to the AI insights. Else the object is empty or null. Note: The url attribute is not present in AI Insights API response. Its present only in the Document Feed API Response

data.description: The AI Generated Insights of the document. Note: The data attribute is present only in AI Insights API response. THe Document Feed API Response returns only url

quick_summary.description: The quick summary of the document

published_date.description: UTC Timestamp of the document published date-time

Announcement.description: Each announcement is enriched with AI-generated insights, such as summary, category tags from a predefined set of categories and sentiment of the announcement content.

type.description: Document type. By default, the value is announcement

ticker.description: Internal ticker representation for the company.

exchange_tickers.description: Contains the company ticker information in BSE, NSE.

source_link.description: The link to the raw announcement document.

announcement_type_id.description: Announcement category/type ID. Example - An announcement could be marked as Company Merger(ID=1)

announcement_type.description: The category/type name. Example - An announcement could be marked as Company Merger(ID=1)

summary_header.description: AI-generated summary header for the announcement

published_date.description: UTC Timestamp of the announcement published date-time

chunk_num.description: Identifier of the chunk in the document

total_count.description: Total Announcemnt count for the given request parameters.

limit.description: Number of Announcements in the current response.
